data.event: The settlement was founded in 1726 by Colonial English Quakers from Chester County led by entrepreneur and evangelist John Wright.

event.title: today as the site of one of the world's few museums devoted

data.event: It is notable today as the site of one of the world's few museums devoted entirely to horology.

event.title: established villages just south of Columbia in what is now

data.event: They established villages just south of Columbia in what is now Washington Boro, as well as points as far south as Maryland.
